mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_mysql_quota_together_hours ( host_id, db_id, quota_id, quota_name, quota_value, last_quota_value, gmt_created, gmt_modifed, last_quota_date ) SELECT host_id, db_id, quota_id, quota_name, SUM(quota_value)/COUNT(1) quota_value, SUM(last_quota_value)/COUNT(1) last_quota_value, MAX(gmt_created), NOW(), MAX(last_quota_date) FROM b_mysql_quota_collect_day WHERE gmt_created >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND gmt_created < STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY host_id, quota_id, quota_name ,db_id
mapper.delete: delete from b_mysql_quota_together_hours where gmt_created < STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
